text: Ara tara allah‌ra sam'mana kare na tamra yathayogya maryadara sathe yakhana tara bale -- ''allah kono manusera kache kichu'i abatarana karena ni.’’ Balo -- ''ke abatarana karechilena granthakhana ya niye musa esechilena -- manusera jan'ya aloka o pathanirdesarupe, ya tomara kagajapatre tule ta prakasa karo o besira bhaga gopana karo, ara tomadera sekhano hayechila ya tomara janate na, -- tomara ara tomadera pitrpurusara'o na?’’ Balo -- ''allah‌.’’ Atahpara tadera chere da'o tadera baje kathaya kheladhulo karate.
